类 Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck
  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Deck contain the card stack would use in a game. It includes the process of reading data from excel , creating cards instance and store in a List of card
    作者:
    Lirui Jin

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private java.util.List<Card> cardStack
      List of cards instance used in a game
      private int numOfCardUsed
      The total number of card would be used
      private int numOfPlayer
      Number of players in a game
      private int sizeOfHand
      Number of hand cards of every player

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Deck​(int numOfPlayer)
      Initialize the game

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      Card getOneCard()
      get the card on the top and remove it
      int getSizeOfHand()
      get size of hand of every player
      private Card initCard​(jxl.Cell[] arrayCells)
      Read information from Cell array and create a Card instance
      private void initialCardStack()
      Initialize the card stack 1.
      private java.util.List<Card> readExcel()
      Using jxl api to read the information from excel 1.get workbook from excel 2.get the sheet 3.get cells in a line and get the content in String 4.using the information read from excel to create card instance
      void shuffle()
      use Collection.shuffle() to shuffle the card stack

        List of cards instance used in a game

        The total number of card would be used

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Deck

        public Deck​(int numOfPlayer)
        Initialize the game
        参数:
        numOfPlayer -

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialCardStack

        private void initialCardStack()
        Initialize the card stack 1. Read data from excel using jxl api 2. Create card instance to store information from excel 3. Calculate the number of cards would be used 4. Random remove cards to adapt the standard
        另请参阅:
        http://jexcelapi.sourceforge.net/

      • readExcel

        private java.util.List<Card> readExcel()
        Using jxl api to read the information from excel 1.get workbook from excel 2.get the sheet 3.get cells in a line and get the content in String 4.using the information read from excel to create card instance
        返回:
        list of card
        另请参阅:
        * http://jexcelapi.sourceforge.net/

      • initCard

        private Card initCard​(jxl.Cell[] arrayCells)
        Read information from Cell array and create a Card instance
        参数:
        arrayCells -
        返回:
        a instance of Card

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        use Collection.shuffle() to shuffle the card stack
        另请参阅:
        Collections

      • getSizeOfHand

        public int getSizeOfHand()
        get size of hand of every player
        返回:
        numbers of hand

      • getOneCard

        public Card getOneCard()
        get the card on the top and remove it
        返回:
        card
